backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and moderation with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new LoveTheLiquid page, routing, and navigation updates to corresponding files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated descriptions of major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH color variables, theming tokens, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with lazy-loaded routes, AppLayout, theme provider, and new /love-the-liquid route.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthorName: Admin UI helper fetching usernames by principal with loading state and fallback formatting.
frontend/src/components/admin/FlaggedPos: Admin panel for viewing, filtering, sorting, and clearing automatically flagged posts.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedCo: Admin panel listing reported comments with actions to clear reports or delete comments, showing loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportedPo: Admin interface for viewing reported posts, allowing report clearing or post deletion with status handling.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Wrapper that blocks age-gated routes until the user confirms being 18+, syncing with profile and local storage.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity, query cache clearing, and age gate reset.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Displays a single comment with reporting, reactions, author info, error handling, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header navigation, mobile menu, authentication gates, and admin link handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Slide-in mobile navigation menu showing links, login, and conditional admin options.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Moder: Styled alert component for displaying moderation warnings or blocked-content messages.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a post card with media, reactions, reporting, deletion, and navigation to comments, using multiple backend hooks for actions and URLs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Shows a required profile setup dialog for new authenticated users, allowing them to submit username, bio, and age confirmation.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Displays reaction buttons with icons and pending states, calling a callback when a reaction is selected.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Provides loading skeletons, error and empty state components, and a background refresh indicator for query-based UI.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Shows a centered spinner and message while async route chunks load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendExternalBlo: Converts an ExternalBlob video into a usable URL, preferring direct URLs and falling back to object URLs with cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Generates a browser URL for an image ExternalBlob using direct or object URLs and handles cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity, authentication status, principal, and fetched profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, storage, status, and lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as posts, profiles, admin status, and usernames with optional auto-refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including accent, chart, and moderation colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with tabs for reviewing reported and flagged content, handling auth and admin access checks.
frontend/src/pages/FactsPage.tsx: Displays a card containing a long list of human-urine-related facts.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Implements the main feed with post creation, media uploads, moderation handling, auto-refreshing posts, and listing posts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the homepage with branding, guidelines fetch, community description, and links to join or access the feed.
frontend/src/pages/LoveTheLiquidPage.tsx: A donation page featuring Ko-fi support options, embedded widget, and reasons to contribute.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post with comments, including loading/error states and a form for adding new comments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides a user profile editor with fields for username, bio, preferences, and admin status checks.
frontend/src/pages/TipsPage.tsx: Shows hydration tips and urine facts in a styled, card-based layout.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Manages localStorage-based age acknowledgment and checks whether routes require age gating.
frontend/src/utils/flaggedPostsView.ts: Utility functions for handling flagged posts, media checks, and sorting/filtering operations.
frontend/src/utils/moderation.ts: Parses and categorizes moderation-related backend errors and normalizes displayed messages.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Handles image validation, conversion to backend format, preview URLs, and error extraction for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/postVideos.ts: Provides functions to validate video files, convert them to ExternalBlob format, and manage preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, and requirements for the "LOVE THE LIQUID" monetization page.
